segments.text: Observing this kitchen, it's a standard setup with counters and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window is open, showing the garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman at the sink holds a plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs, basin full, water edges over the rim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the floor beneath her stance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, stool positioned before the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy ascends the steps, extends arm to cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tilts slightly under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He balances a plate while grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby raises hand toward the action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window panes neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures routine with subtle disruptions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside remains undisturbed by interior events.
segments.speaker: PAR
